caption: It’s a good business but we’re in a global pandemic I’m one of the workers wasn’t wearing his mask and he was very rude to me. The baked ziti with meat sauce and the calzone are the best ever. The prices are very reasonable. Very friendly customer service and very accommodating. I highly recommend this place as it is better than any other restaurant in Little Italy Bx.
Love my sausage slice with a little dizzle of extra cheese.

You have about 5 or 6 pizzarias in Little Italy in the Bronx and they all cannot compare to Bella pizza on 184th and 3rd Ave. The flavors and great and the service is just as great. The have a huge variety of foods from pizza to burgers. All great and the prices are reasonable for the quality of food your getting. Been goin there for over 3 years now and I won't stop! 10*s

I stumbled across this place by accident a few years ago after a hospital trip. I ordered a slice and it was AMAZING! Afterwards, it became my family's go to spot for pizza. They are very nice and the pizza tastes great.  Delivery is also super fast. They are almost always at my door in 25-30 minutes. There was a short period of time where the quality wasn't what I'd come to expect from them, but they have definitely made a comeback! There isn't really much parking nearby, since it's on the corner of 3rd ave. There are only a couple of tables inside, but the place is clean and friendly. You may want to order out, but this place is worth a visit.
